name: AtmosphereConnect
0:
”Alexa, ask atmosphere to set mode to turbo.”
”Alexa, tell atmosphere to set fan to speed three.”
”Alexa, tell atmosphere to turn the fan down.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: atmosphere
Developer Terms of Use
des: Amway is helping you create a cleaner, safer, smarter home. The new Atmosphere Sky™ Air Treatment system is the brand’s next generation of proven performance and technology – with the Atmosphere Connect skill, you now have the opportunity to control and monitor your Atmosphere Sky™ from anywhere.
